New Records: This match broke the altitude record for an international fixture.
Key Match Events: Ramiro Vaca opened the scoring in the 13th minute
Carmelo Algara√±az doubled the lead from the spot before halftime
Miguel Terceros scored early in the second half
Enzo Monteiro sealed the win in the 89th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's newly-appointed coach Oscar Villegas secured his first victory at the helm
Bolivia moved into the international playoffs spot in seventh place with six points
Bolivia will play against Chile next
Miscellaneous Highlights: Some 20,000 fans gathered at the Municipal de El Alto stadium at 4,150 metres above sea level
This was Bolivia's second win in the South American World Cup qualifiers
